jyVis.visualizationPrimitives
Class GlyphCollection

java.lang.Object
  jyVis.visualizationPrimitives.GlyphCollection
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Iterable<Glyph>
public class GlyphCollection
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Iterable<Glyph>

A class which manages the color, shape, and size aspects of a collection of glyphs which correspond to records in a DataTable.

Author:
Curran Kelleher

Field Summary
 boolean drawOutlines
          The flag determining whether or not the glyphs will be outlined

          The transformation which stores the size interval for the glyphs

Field Detail

panel

public DrawingPanel panel
The drawing panel that the glyphs are drawn on

shapeDimension

public int shapeDimension
The index of the dimension which will determine the shape. If this is assigned directly, updateGlyphs() must be called to see the updates on screen

sizeTransformation

public Transformation sizeTransformation
The transformation which stores the size interval for the glyphs

sizeDimension

public int sizeDimension
The index of the dimension which will determine the size. If this is assigned directly, updateGlyphs() must be called to see the updates on screen

drawOutlines

public boolean drawOutlines
The flag determining whether or not the glyphs will be outlined

Constructor Detail

GlyphCollection

public GlyphCollection(DrawingPanel panel)
Constructs a collection of glyphs. When this constructor is invoked, new JVGlyph objects are created for every record in the data table inside of the panel, set up for selection, and added to the panel.

Method Detail

getGlyphs

public java.util.List<Glyph> getGlyphs()

the list of glyphs that this class is managing.

setDrawOutlines

public void setDrawOutlines(boolean drawOutlines)
Sets the flag for drawing outlines on all glyphs in this collection, then updates the display

Parameters:
drawOutlines - whether or not outlines should be drawn on the glyphs

getDrawOutlines

public boolean getDrawOutlines()
Gets the flag for drawing outlines on all glyphs in this collection

updateGlyphs

public void updateGlyphs(boolean updateColors,
                         boolean updateShapes,
                         boolean updateSize,
                         boolean updateOutlines)
Iterates through all glyphs, updating the properties specified, then redisplays the drawing panel.

Parameters:
updateColors - if true, the colors of all shapes will be updated
updateShapes - if true, the shapes of all shapes will be updated
updateSize - if true, the sizes of all shapes will be updated
updateOutlines - if true, the outlines of all shapes will be updated

updateGlyphs

public void updateGlyphs(boolean updateColors,
                         boolean updateShapes,
                         boolean updateSize,
                         boolean updateOutlines,
                         boolean updateDisplay)
Iterates through all glyphs, updating the properties specified, then redisplays the drawing panel.

Parameters:
updateColors - if true, the colors of all shapes will be updated
updateShapes - if true, the shapes of all shapes will be updated
updateSize - if true, the sizes of all shapes will be updated
updateOutlines - if true, the outlines of all shapes will be updated
